Yes, there are many guided tours and group hikes available in Moffat. These can be great options if you are new to hiking or are feeling intimidated by the thought of going solo. By joining a tour, you can benefit from the knowledge and experience of a guide or hiker who knows the area well. 

Here are some local companies and organizations that offer guided tours and group hikes in Moffat:

1. Moffat Walking Tours: Moffat Walking Tours offers guided tours around the historic town and surrounding countryside. They also organize hikes and walking challenges for different skill levels.

2. Walk Moffat: Walk Moffat is a group of local hikers who organize weekly hikes of varying lengths and difficulty levels. These group hikes are a great way to meet new people and explore the best hiking trails in the area.

3. Galloway Wild Foods: Galloway Wild Foods offer guided foraging walks in Moffat and its surrounding areas. You can learn about the plants, fruits, fungi, and other food sources that can be found in the wild.

4. Adventure Scotland: Adventure Scotland offers a range of outdoor activities, including guided hikes, mountain bike tours, and hillwalking adventures. These tours are suitable for all abilities and are led by experienced guides.

5. Southern Upland Way: The Southern Upland Way is a long-distance hiking trail that passes through Moffat. If you are planning to hike the trail, you can join a guided walk with one of the many outdoor companies that offer this experience.

Remember to always do your research and choose a reputable company or organization that suits your needs and abilities. Contributing to group walks can make the experience safer and more enjoyable.
